content:
Here's the response:

"Awesome, I've got the link for you! Here it is: [link to Petco's dental chews sale]. Just click on it and you'll be all set!

And aw, sorry to hear that Whiskers is being finicky with her food! Don't worry, I'm happy to help you find a new option for her! Petco has a wide range of high-quality cat food brands that might just do the trick. Have you considered trying a grain-free or limited ingredient diet for Whiskers? Sometimes, cats can get picky due to food sensitivities. Petco has some great options from brands like Orijen, Acana, and Blue Buffalo. Would you like some recommendations or maybe even a personalized suggestion based on Whiskers' age, breed, and preferences?"
